T02D3354:36a-1: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3354:36a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3354:36a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3354:36a-5: yid mthun gnas ni kha cig tu //
T02D3354:36a-6: bde ba'i gdan la 'dug nas su //
T02D3354:36a-7: rnal 'byor byams dang snying rjer ldan //
T02D3354:36a-8: sngags 'di lan gsum brjod par bya //
T02D3354:36a-9: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko&amp ;
T02D3354:36b-0: zhes byas brtan @36b dang g-yo ba'i dngos //
T02D3354:36b-1: bdag nyid lus dang thams cad du //
T02D3354:36b-2: sems kyis stong nyid bsgom par bya //
T02D3354:36b-3: rmi lam rmi lam mtshungs pa ru //
T02D3354:36b-4: pam yig las ni yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02D3354:36b-5: padma zla ba'i gdan gnas pa //
T02D3354:36b-6: ser po dh'i:ni dgod byas te //
T02D3354:36b-7: de yi bdag nyid bcom ldan ma //
T02D3354:36b-8: phyag gnyis shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D3354:36b-9: sna tshogs gos 'chang sna tshogs brgyan //
T02D3354:36b-10: chos 'chad phyag rgya mnyam ldan phyag / sgeg pa gcig pu nyams ldan zhing //
T02D3354:36b-11: rdo rje skyil krung yang dag gnas //
T02D3354:36b-12: po tis mtshan pa'i pad sdong ni //
T02D3354:36b-13: g-yon gyi logs su bsnams pa'o //
T02D3354:36b-14: spyi bo mgrin pa snying gnas pa'i //
T02D3354:36b-15: zla ba la gnas de nyid gsum //
T02D3354:36b-17: aam aa:ngag gi dbus su ni //
T02D3354:36b-19: de nas gzugs ser rnam par bsgom //
T02D3354:36b-20: kun rdzob kyi ni rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D3354:36b-21: shes rab mchod pa bsgom par bya //
T02D3354:36b-22: don dam par ni rtogs pa'i gzugs //
T02D3354:36b-23: shes rab bdag nyid che brjod bya //
T02D3354:36b-24: gang gis byang chub nges thob pa'i //
T02D3354:36b-26: ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od //
T02D3354:36b-27: dkar po'i sems ni rnam par bsgom //
T02D3354:36b-28: sna tshogs g-yo dang mi g-yo ba //
T02D3354:36b-29: de bzhin phyis ni nam mkha' mnyam //
T02D3354:36b-30: ma lus rtogs pas stong pa yi //
T02D3354:36b-31: rang nyid gzugs med stong par yang //
T02D3354:36b-32: gzugs sgra dri dang ro dang ni //
T02D3354:36b-33: reg bya la sogs gzung dang 'dzin //
T02D3354:36b-34: rtog pas yongs su ma gos pa //
T02D3354:36b-35: bsam mi khyab pa'i rkyen bskyed pa //
T02D3354:36b-36: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub don //
T02D3354:36b-37: kun mkhyen sems kyi go 'phang ngo //
T02D3354:36b-38: de la 'di bzlas pa'i sngags te /
T02D3354:36b-39: aom pradzny'a ma h'a pradzny'a shru ti smri ti bi dza yi dh'i:sv'ah'a /
T02D3354:36b-40: shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms pa'i //
T02D3354:36b-41: bdag gi bsod nams gang thob des //
T02D3354:36b-42: de yis 'jig rten ma lus kun //
T02D3354:36b-43: shes rab pha rol phyin gzhol shog / shes rab
T02D3354:36b-44: kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs
T02D3354:36b-45: so ; / pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
